attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: So I have been so excited for our president and all that he does and I just wanted to support him and get his app, unfortunately it took ab a week to download and it’s so messy. Sometimes when I use it my whole phone shuts off. Idk what’s happening but this is the worst app I’ve ever used. I wonder if Bernie has an app??

attributes.title: BAD APP! DISGOOSTANG!🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download and it wasn’t worth it at all! As soon as I downloaded it I began getting creepy messages and I think it would’ve led to human trafficking!😰😰 The app also caused my phone to crash multiple times and my credit card got hacked!! Plus this app game me gonorrhea!!😱 This app has ruined my life! Delete it soon please!

attributes.title: Tank you for this dumb app😻
attributes.review: I just wanna start out, this app is rly dangerous. It took a good 1-3 days to download, but it will kick you out the app. But for some reason it kept asking me for my location and that was creeping me out, I didn’t want a 🍊orange cheeto puff🍊 stalking me. So please stay safe with this weird disgusting and dumb app. :) it’s rly bad trump so you should be very ashamed for that:))

attributes.title: Unconstitutional
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. It made me consent to giving them all of my personal information plus e-sign a contract saying that I’ll write in Trump for the next 400 elections and then started sending me push notifications linking to P0RN0GRAPHY! I’m now in the hospital because my poor virgin heart couldn’t handle the things I saw.

attributes.title: It didn’t load fast enough 🙄
attributes.review: I hate it ! It didn’t load fast enough unlike my other apps ! It took to long and honestly I didn’t really understand the whole point of the app ! Please if your planning on waiting forever then go ahead and download it but if not this is just a advice

attributes.title: Wow.
attributes.review: This app took about a whole week to download and when it did download it took a lot of space on my phone. I don’t recommended downloading this. it wastes time and its just bad in general. After a day of having the app i got creepy messages.😟😰 This app takes half of my phones storage and doesnt do anything.

attributes.title: most ugly app I have ever download don’t download this 🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: It first the app was great but after using the app few times my phone start to be so laggy at the point I can’t even use it then my phone gets really hot at the point my phone says PHONE TO HOT TO BE IN USER  like a said don’t download this plus this app give me a virus in my phone 🤬🤬🤬🤢🤮🤮🤮🤢😷😷

attributes.title: Notifications!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it has been NONSTOP notifications and texts. I want to keep informed and support the campaign but it has been extremely annoying. So far the content has been mostly about donating money and no information at all. Do not waste your time with this app!!

attributes.title: ✨🦄GEN Z-2020💕🧚🏾
attributes.review: This app is 💩. I didn’t even get the information I needed. Besides that no changes are being enforced in this country.........are the trump supporters gone now 👀....... GOOD😁I can’t believe trump really had the nerve to try shut down tik tok🤦🏾‍♀️.....GEN Z is not going down without a fight. GEN Z literally LIVES on tik tok☠️ but that’s alright because we’re about to shut this mf down💖✨💕

attributes.title: Amazing app!!💪💯
attributes.review: The app is amazing!!! A bunch of cringe 13 year old TikTokers tried to raid the reviews🤣💀 I can see them pounding sand as I write this. Please give the app a try it’s great. Nice try nerds.
